name: Cursed Elements
description:
Cursed Elements tells the story of a group of friends banding together, seeking a way to break a curse that befell one of the party members. In this demo version, you can experience:

  • Approximately 3-5 hours of content
  • A good vs evil path that plays a part in the protagonist’s development
  • Challenging battles that keep adventurers on their toes
  • Several sidequests, organized in a quest journal
  • A diverse cast of characters, including LGBT+ individuals

Content Warning: This game, while lighthearted in appearance, contains dark situations and mature themes. The developer does not condone the actions of the villains in this game; they are just that - villains. Use your own discretion as to whether you are comfortable engaging with the content.

Cursed Elements is being developed in RPG Maker MV. Development began in April 2019 and is still a work in progress. My current goal for this project is to find people to create original art (and possibly music) for the game. If you would like to participate in this project, or if you have any questions or concerns, please contact me.

The current credits are as follows...
